title: Gear Head Blue Tooth Laser Mouse for Mac Book, White with Silver Accents (BT9400WHT)
description: Gear Head BT9400WHT Wireless Optical Mouse Get portability and comfort combined with Optical Sensing Technology with the Gear Head BT9400WHT Wireless Optical Mouse. Fueled by Bluetooth 3.0 Wireless connectivity, the Gear Head BT9400WHT Wireless Optical Mouse can go wireless whether you are on a PC or Mac. The scalable DPI of the Gear Head BT9400WHT Wireless Optical Mouse includes 800 DPI, 1200 DPI, and 1600 DPI so you can customize to your movements. What It Is and Why You Need It: Bluetooth 3.0 Connectivity Scalable DPI 800/1200/1600 Optical Sensing Technology Specifications Gear Head BT9400WHT Wireless Optical Mouse Device Type: Mouse Connection Type: Wireless Bluetooth Weight: 0.35 lbs Hand Orientation: Right Tracking Method: Optical Dimensions: 3 x 8.2 x 5.9 Inches Resolution: 1200 DPI 800 dpi 1600 DPI Colors: Silver White Power Supply Type: 2 AAA Batteries Special Features: Bluetooth Technology Scrolling Capability: Yes
